description: This Dart source file defines the AppRouter class, which provides a minimal routing map for a Flutter mobile application. It sets up the initial route '/' to display an AppShell widget with a centered welcome message.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A utility class offering static routing configuration without instances. It provides a route map for the main application.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: A static getter returning a map of route names to WidgetBuilder functions, defining the initial route '/' with a basic AppShell containing a welcome message.
